description: Scotty was staying with Andrew for the weekend. Andrew thought Scotty had to work on Sunday morning so he went in and woke him up. Scotty told him that he switched days with a coworker so he could relax for once. Andrew knew a great way for a dude to relax---head. So he offered Scotty a bj and, after some persuasion, Scotty gave in and ended up getting the best blow job of his life so far. He was so turned on that he decided to fuck his first gay dude. And after this, it is safe to say, Scotty will be fucking dudes the rest of his life.
title: Hottie For Scotty
